entry: Support for webcam and microphone in Replay and Record
original_text: Support for webcam and microphone in Replay and Record

entry: Added support for sending arbitrary changesets and partial changsets with ksdiff.
original_text: Added support for sending arbitrary changesets and partial changsets with ksdiff.

entry: - Updated Settings page including link to "My Rewards"
original_text: - Updated Settings page including link to "My Rewards"

entry: - Score Attack Mode: a new way to play through the story! You start at level one with all Spirits and Idols unlocked. Combat performance is rated for efficiency, and all areas are repeatable.
original_text: - Score Attack Mode: a new way to play through the story! You start at level one with all Spirits and Idols unlocked. Combat performance is rated for efficiency, and all areas are repeatable.

entry: _ Reduced battery usage
original_text: _ Reduced battery usage

entry: Fixed a bug where the summary text in document titles and tabs might not properly update.

entry: _ Fix for an issue where older conversations were not appearing for some people
original_text: _ Fix for an issue where older conversations were not appearing for some people

original_text: - Many visual and performance improvements

entry: Fixed issue that could prevent Kaleidoscope from picking up changes made to a document open in more than one window.
original_text: Fixed issue that could prevent Kaleidoscope from picking up changes made to a document open in more than one window.

entry: •	New: Now you can filter and sort your playlists and tracks.
original_text: •	New: Now you can filter and sort your playlists and tracks.

entry: Sofa has acquired all Versions intellectual property from Pico. You can read the entire press release here.

entry: - The size buttons now show what size they will be saving.

entry: Video: Send videos from your phone's camera roll and when people send you videos, play them right in the app.
original_text: Video: Send videos from your phone's camera roll and when people send you videos, play them right in the app.
